w21zt88sbk.name: Al-Taqua Mosque
w21zt88sbk.remarks: In the â€˜60s, this masjid was one of the important symbols for the villagers living in kampung around Bedok. Built in 1883, this single-storey masjid has gone several renovations. It now serves the handful residents living nearby as well as in the East. With a capacity of 400 worshippers, the masjid holds regular religious classes.
